description: Marcus Mojo is at it again! He loves sending naughty texts and pictures to his friends. Today he's hanging out with Oliver Saint. The guys are planning on tearing up the clubs later, but first they're doing some phone flirting. When Marcus sends a girl friend of his a picture of his cock, Oliver wants Marcus to send a pic of his cock too! While Marcus is taking the picture, he notices how nice Oliver's boner looks. Oliver is a little surprised, but thankful to hear the kind words. In fact Marcus admires Oliver's juicy dick so much, he wants to see how it tastes. And while they're at it, Marcus figures it would be an honor to have such a beautiful cock in his ass. What a way to get psyched for a night on the town!Enjoy!
title: Sex And Texts
